tasks.label: Start Redis
tasks.command: if [ "$(docker ps -q -f name=redis)" ]; then echo 'Redis container is already running.'; else docker run --name redis -p 6379:6379 -d redis:latest; fi

tasks.label: Stop Redis
tasks.command: docker stop redis && docker rm redis

tasks.label: Start Docker Compose Services
tasks.command: if [ "$(docker ps -q -f name=celery_worker)" ]; then echo 'Services are already running.'; else docker-compose up -d; fi
tasks.detail: Starts Redis and Celery worker using Docker Compose (if not already running)

tasks.label: Stop Docker Compose Services
tasks.detail: Stops and removes Redis and Celery worker containers

tasks.label: Rebuild and Start Docker Compose Services
tasks.detail: Rebuilds and starts Redis and Celery worker containers (use after code changes)

tasks.label: View Docker Compose Logs
tasks.detail: Shows logs from all Docker Compose services
